cantaloupe.generation.generator module¶

class cantaloupe.generation.generator.CodeGenerator(context: Context)[source]¶

Bases: object

This class is responsible for translation YAML into valid scripts.

generate() → GeneratorResult[source]¶

generates the code for all given workflows

generate_step(step: Step) → str | None[source]¶

generates one or many lines of code for a given step

generate_steps(workflow: Workflow) → list[str][source]¶

iterates over all steps in the workflow and calls lifecycle hooks.

import_workflow(step: Step) → Workflow[source]¶

imports a yaml file and returns a Workflow object
